price: Anaasε wͻ’pε sε wͻbͻ pͻ (bͻne) bi (tia Nkͻmhyεni)? Ɛneε wͻn a wͻ’nnye nnie no ara na wͻbεtͻ fidie no mu.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
